name: Soul Suck
description: You can freeze someone in place for a short amount of time, allowing for a good 1 2 punch.

actions.command: execute as @p at @s anchored eyes facing entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1] eyes anchored feet positioned ^ ^ ^1 rotated as @s positioned ^ ^ ^-1 if entity @s[distance=..0.3] run effect give @e[sort=nearest,limit=1] slowness 5 250 true

execute as @p at @s anchored eyes facing entity @e[sort=nearest,limit=1] eyes anchored feet positioned ^ ^ ^1 rotated as @s positioned ^ ^ ^-1 if entity @s[distance=..0.3] run effect give @e[sort=nearest,limit=1] blindness 5 250 true
